data.text:
2016 Company Production: The Drowsy Chaperone

The Drowsy Chaperone revolves around one musical theatre fan’s obsession with a fictional 1928 musical comedy, The Drowsy Chaperone. As he listens to the recording, the characters come to life in his apartment. Winner of 5 Tony awards, you won’t want to miss this hysterical musical! The Drowsy Chaperone performed Feb 19-March 5, 2016 on ELA’s Main Stage.

The Cast of Drowsy Chaperone
